mailcontent: You have unclaimed rewards from Dragon Castle. We have issued them via mail, please claim your attachment.
desc:
The place where the great dragon is put in slumber. It holds countless spirits of the dead - Dragon Castle
Many people hope to find it. Dear warriors! Rally up your men
Wake up the dragon from its slumber and defeat it, earn ample rewards. 
|C:0xf5e65a&T:Tips: After joining the Dungeon, call your friends to challenge together for more rewards! |
yaoqingdesc:
The monster is coming, rally up your teammates and prepare for battle! 
We have now extended our invitations to the whole server. Time to earn higher rewards
